title: Completed battle boss brand mission but not rewarded
body: I completed and won an intermediate bot game with a brand bot on the enemy team. Because the mission says that brand may be on either team and it doesn't specify that it has to be pvp, I thought this would complete the mission. However, it is still listed as incomplete in the quest list. Am I reading something wrong or is this unintended behavior?

replies.body: That mission doesn't state that it needs to be PVP, but I believe it does mention that it needs to be a matchmade game. Bot games aren't considered to be matchmade, since the opposing team is comprised of AI, which is why that mission isn't completing.
Alright, its just confusing since for previous missions, co-op vs. AI counted as matchmade games
